summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to energy efficiency and energy conservation: amending Section 22.700.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code ("SMC") to adopt by reference the 2004 Washington State Energy Code (WAC 51-11) and to repeal the 2003 Washington State Energy Code and amendments thereto; and amending the 2004 Washington State Energy Code Chapter 7, Standards; Chapter 10, Default Heat Loss Coefficients; Chapter 11, Administration and Enforcement; Chapter 13, Building Envelope; Chapter 14, Building Mechanical Systems; Chapter 15, Lighting, Motors, and Transformers; and Reference Standard 29, Nonresidential Building Design by Systems Analysis.
